heading: False statements in certificates, forms, written statements, applications, reports, or certificates of correction
text:
It
shall be unlawful for any person to knowingly or negligently make or allow to be made a material false statement in any certificate,
professional certification, form, signed statement, application, report or certification of the correction of a violation that is either
submitted directly to the department or that is generated with the intent that the department rely on its assertions.
